name: Major League Gladiators
description: Major League Gladiators is a 2-player co-op shooter for VR. Each taking control of one of two classes, players will have to survive endless rounds of enemies by combining their unique movement and combat abilities as well as maintaining each others resources.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
